tag.title: 公司名
tag.content: id="countryList" queryAction="/test/comboselectf.jsp" textField="title" valueField="id" xpath="BagendaImpl" width="160" filterField="id" nullText="------请选择-------"

tag.title: 单位名
tag.content: id="provinceList" linkId="countryList" queryAction="/richweb_demo.do?method=getOrgList" textField="orgname" valueField="orgid" xpath="Torganization" width="168"

tag.title: 市
tag.content: id="dsmc2" queryAction="/yzjmwd/lxsd/LxsdAction_queryDsmc2.action" linkId="sfmc2" textField="V__DSMC" valueField="C__XZQH" nullText="请选择地市" xpath="Zjxzqh2" width="120"

tag.title: 县
